title.en: HELCOM HEAT (5): Compute the Assessment (HOLAS mode)

description.en: Process to compute the HELCOM Assessment for the HEAT assessment tool. HOLAS mode means that for the HOLAS periods, default spatial grids, configuration and default data is provided, which you can just use. This process represents subpart 5 of the original HEAT assessment computation script. For more info, please go to: https://github.com/ices-tools-prod/HEAT/tree/master

links.title: GitHub repo for the original HEAT analysis

assessment_period.title: Assessment Period
assessment_period.description: Ask HELCOM. Example: HOLAS-2 (2011-2016), HOLAS-3 (2016-2021), or Other (1877-9999).

assessment_indicators.title: Assessment Indicators Table
assessment_indicators.description: CSV file of calculated EQRS per assessment period per assessment unit (AssessmentIndicators.csv).

assessment.title: Assessment Table
assessment.description: CSV file: table of calculated EQRS per assessment unit, grouped by overall and criterial level indicators (Assessment.csv).
